title: Snake
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Lower with an exhale and release your hands. Bring legs and feet together Draw shoulder blades together and back Keep neck in line with spine Press tops of feet into floor Avoid this pose if you have high blood pressure or heart conditions.
